data.title: Rady Children's Hospital
data.meta_description: Located at 3020 Children's Way, San Diego, CA 92123. Recognized as one of the top children's hospitals in the US. Learn about our programs and services.
data.text:
Public Notice of Meeting Regarding Proposed Merger of Rady Children's Hospital and Health Center and Children's Health Care of California

The Attorney General will conduct public meetings on August 20, 2024 at 10:00 AM, at the Multipurpose Room at the San Diego Continuing Education North City Campus, located at 8355 Aero Drive, San Diego, California 92123, and on August 22, 2024 at 10:00 AM, at the Orange County Transportation Authority hearing room, located at 500 South Main Street, Orange, California 92868. The purpose of these public meetings is to receive comments on the proposed change of control and governance and to consider the Health Care Impact Statement prepared by a consultant engaged by the California Attorney General. Read the full text of the public notice here.
